Chinese rescuers brave freezing cold to find earthquake survivorsBraving sub-zero conditions, thousands of rescuers faced an uphill task on Wednesday finding and treating survivors of a strong earthquake that rocked a remote area in China's northwestern Gansu province more than a day ago. Wed, 20 Dec 2023 03:04:30 GMT 3NHT46KEGFNLBAEY5UR5VZICLM https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinese-rescuers-brave-freezing-cold-find-earthquake-survivors-2023-12-20/Liz Lee世界中国
The Li clan will deal their way out of value trapLi Ka-shing, Asia’s original tycoon, converted to shareholder religion nearly a decade ago when he carved up his Hong Kong-based empire. Though investors supported the deal, they have rapidly lost faith in the company as Sino-American tensions rise. Solving the value conundrum will be a top priority for his son Victor Li in 2024. Wed, 20 Dec 2023 02:02:25 GMT KZEI5W4UEFOFDE7AKIWOFVSPLM https://www.reuters.com/breakingviews/li-clan-will-deal-their-way-out-value-trap-2023-12-20/Una Galani突破性观点突发观点预测
China leaves lending benchmark rates unchanged as expectedMarket watchers expect Beijing to deliver further monetary easing into the new year. Wed, 20 Dec 2023 01:38:09 GMT QPP64NXGD5LUBDDFLYHGTRORWU https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/china-leaves-lending-benchmark-rates-unchanged-expected-2023-12-20/Reuters市场宏观问题
Shift in Chinese retailers' strategy risks entrenching deflationA shift in Chinese retailers' strategy toward lower-priced goods and services to win cost-conscious consumers risks embedding the country's recent deflationary trends more permanently into the world's second-largest economy. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 23:07:39 GMT埃托莱夫ZSZLYVMSSRMWEI5WZRY https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/shift-chinese-retailers-strategy-risks-entrenching-deflation-2023-12-19/Sophie Yu, Brenda Goh市场亚洲市场
US adds 13 companies in China to Unverified ListThe United States has added 13 companies in China to a list of entities receiving U.S. exports that officials have been unable to inspect, according to a government notice posted on Tuesday. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 14:21:25 GMT GYSITP6OR5KONGED6UFQBP56PQ https://www.reuters.com/markets/us-adds-13-companies-china-unverified-list-2023-12-19/Karen Freifeld市场
Australia court finds Melbourne man guilty of foreign interferenceAn Australia court on Tuesday found a Melbourne man who held prominent positions in Chinese community associations guilty of planning an act of foreign interference, the first verdict of its kind under a law introduced in 2018. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 09:49:21 GMT KR45U76BLZNVLJDZSDQESLSEHY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/australia-court-finds-melbourne-man-guilty-foreign-interference-2023-12-19/Reuters世界亚太地区
